Sandbox Industries is looking for a Lead Developer / CTO for two of our startups: Lab42 (http://www.lab42.com) and doggyloot (http://www.doggyloot.com). Both have existing, well-working platforms built in-house on Ruby/Rails, have recently received venture funding, are generating revenue, and are growing rapidly.

Details are here:

http://sbx.tw/doggylootdeveloper

http://sbx.tw/lab42developer

Compensation will include salary + equity. Both positions would be on-site (or mostly on-site) in Chicago.

Sandbox is a pretty sweet place to work, if I do say so myself.

Millie - millie@sandboxindustries.com
